author: stas
msg: make sure to set base server's mip before any of the
PerlRequire/PerlModule directives are called, since they may add
add_config(), which in turn runs Perl sections or PerlLoadModule,
which may need the scfg->mip to be set.

author: stas
msg: add macros to change the base server startup phases

author: stas
msg: log that ModPerl::MM is now fully functional

author: stas
msg: fix a segfault caused by PerlModule in $s->add_config, due to setting
the MP_init_done flag before init was done + add test
